fields.Title of Presentation: Amazon Web Services: What Services Should You Use For Hosting Your Applications?
fields.Description/Abstract: According to the 2024 Stackoverflow Developer survey, 48% of all respondents and 52.2% of professional respondents stated that they use Amazon Web Services (AWS) extensively. These numbers are no surprise given the flexibility and customization of over a hundred services offered by AWS. This presentation will focus on three services used for application hosting: (1) Elastic Compute Cloud, (2) Beanstalk, and (3) Lambda. We will compare and contrast these services to better understand the best choice for a given business scenario.
